transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan good afternoon Shaanwar ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Sir main Akanksha IndiaMART se aapke account manager, kaise hain?
Executive: Bas theek thaak.
Customer: Sir ye aapne ek tarikh ko customer care pe call kiya tha na?
Executive: Haan ye mera IndiaMART chal hi nahi raha hai. Ye app nahi chal rahi hai to mujhe Chrome se jaake chalana pad raha hai.
Customer: Abhi chal rahi hai ya nahi chal rahi hai sir?
Executive: Nahi nahi, nahi chal rahi hai. buyleads bhi nahi show kar rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur
Customer: Aapne app reinstall kiya? Reinstall?
Executive: Sab kuch, sab kuch kar liya. Update kar liya, reinstall kar liya, A to Z jo kuch ho sakta tha.
Customer: To aisa kya issue ho sakta hai sir aur to koi
Executive: Lead manager aur buyleads, kuch bhi nahi chal raha hai ye.
Customer: Achha. Google Meet se join karenge?
Executive: Ki bas chal raha hai.
Customer: Google Meet ka link bheju main?
Executive: Haan, mere uss pe bhej dijiye, kya naam hai, mail pe.
Customer: Aapke registered email ID pe?
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai, aapke registered mail pe bhej rahe hain abhi, aap join kar lena paanch minute mein.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- IndiaMART app is not working.
- Forced to use Chrome to access the platform.
- Buyleads and Lead Manager are not functioning in the app.
- Basic troubleshooting (reinstall, update) has failed.


Resolution:

- Offered to troubleshoot the issue via a Google Meet call.
- Confirmed sending the meeting link to the customer's registered email.


Next Steps: 
- Issue not resolved.
- Executive to send a Google Meet link for a screen-sharing session.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Annoyed -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- app not working, buyleads, lead manager, technical issue, google meet, troubleshooting
